formalText: He felt like he need a success and the people around him did too so he is feeling good about finishing his dissertation.
They don't want to apply for postdoc studies even though they can.
They tend to feel like less of his experience should be private.
It is hard for him to be around his wife because she is still very depressed.

He is getting annoyed with their friends because they keep on congratulating them for getting through Tanya's depression but he feels like they haven't done anything and are still in the same spot. He finds it irritating.
They  feel trapped in their relationship because they can identify that in theory they could alleviate some of those things and they think they just talked about that in some sense.
But it is hard on him because she's unhappy most of the time.
He feels like he can't trust her to the same extent.
